recipesJson.name: Yogurt mango  parfait
recipesJson.author: Badboyji38
recipesJson.description: Any flavours art strawberry are good in this mix. Just hint granola to give it the  crunch taste in the yogurt. The strawberry give the mango a nice sweet taste will to me it do but probably not to everyone else, you get the mango right off the bat and everything else fallow.
